languages.text: "Исключительно по неведению. Вероятно, твари притаились в грузах, и их никто не обнаружил, либо... Мы знаем, что эти твари могут захватывать умы, они могли подчинить любого, кто наткнулся на их гнездовище".

"Purely out of ignorance. The creatures probably lurked in the cargo and no one discovered them, or perhaps... We know these things can take over minds. They could have dominated anyone who stumbled upon their nest."
languages.original_text: "Исключительно по неведению. Вероятно, твари притаились в грузах, и их никто не обнаружил, либо... Мы знаем, что эти твари могут захватывать умы, они могли подчинить любого, кто наткнулся на их гнездовище".

traits.locale_text: "Purely out of ignorance. The creatures probably lurked in the cargo and no one discovered them, or perhaps... We know these things can take over minds, they could dominate anyone who stumbled upon their nest."

"Purely out of ignorance. The creatures probably lurked in the cargo and no one discovered them, or perhaps... We know these things can take over minds. They could have dominated anyone who stumbled upon their nest."

languages.text: «Por pura ignorancia. Probablemente, las criaturas se escondieran en la bodega y nadie las descubriera, o... Sabemos que esos seres pueden dominar mentes. Podrían haber controlado a quien encontrara su nido».
languages.original_text: "Purely out of ignorance. The creatures probably lurked in the cargo and no one discovered them, or perhaps... We know these things can take over minds. They could have dominated anyone who stumbled upon their nest."

traits.locale_text: «Por pura ignorancia. Probablemente, las criaturas se escondieran en la bodega y nadie las descubriera, o... Sabemos que esos seres pueden dominar mentes. Podrían haber controlado a quien encontrara su nido».

languages.text: 「純粋に無知なのでしょう。生き物はおそらく貨物の中に潜んでいて、誰も発見しなかったか、あるいは…。彼らは心を支配することができる。巣に偶然出くわした者を支配することもできたでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Purely out of ignorance. The creatures probably lurked in the cargo and no one discovered them, or perhaps... We know these things can take over minds. They could have dominated anyone who stumbled upon their nest."

traits.locale_text: 「純粋に無知なのでしょう。生き物はおそらく貨物の中に潜んでいて、誰も発見しなかったか、あるいは…。彼らは心を支配することができる。巣に偶然出くわした者を支配することもできたでしょう」

languages.text: “人们对此毫不知情。那些怪物当初很可能潜伏在货物之中，没有被任何人发现过。也可能是……我们已经知道，这些怪物可以控制人们的思想。说不定也有人偶然发现过它们的巢穴，但最终却落入了它们的魔掌。”
languages.original_text: "Purely out of ignorance. The creatures probably lurked in the cargo and no one discovered them, or perhaps... We know these things can take over minds. They could have dominated anyone who stumbled upon their nest."

traits.locale_text: “人们对此毫不知情。那些怪物当初很可能潜伏在货物之中，没有被任何人发现过。也可能是……我们已经知道，这些怪物可以控制人们的思想。说不定也有人偶然发现过它们的巢穴，但最终却落入了它们的魔掌。”

languages.text: "Aus purer Unwissenheit. Die Kreaturen lauerten wahrscheinlich in der Fracht, und niemand entdeckte sie, oder vielleicht ... Wir wissen, dass diese Dinger den Verstand übernehmen können. Sie hätten jeden beherrschen können, der über ihr Nest stolperte."
languages.original_text: "Purely out of ignorance. The creatures probably lurked in the cargo and no one discovered them, or perhaps... We know these things can take over minds. They could have dominated anyone who stumbled upon their nest."

traits.locale_text: "Aus purer Unwissenheit. Die Kreaturen lauerten wahrscheinlich in der Fracht, und niemand entdeckte sie, oder vielleicht ... Wir wissen, dass diese Dinger den Verstand übernehmen können. Sie hätten jeden beherrschen können, der über ihr Nest stolperte."

languages.text: « À son insu, oui. Les créatures se terraient sans doute quelque part au milieu du chargement et personne n'a dû s'en apercevoir, à moins que... Nous savons que ces monstres sont capables de manipuler les esprits. Ils auraient très bien pu soumettre à leur volonté tous ceux qui ont eu le malheur de les débusquer. »
languages.original_text: "Purely out of ignorance. The creatures probably lurked in the cargo and no one discovered them, or perhaps... We know these things can take over minds. They could have dominated anyone who stumbled upon their nest."

traits.locale_text: « À son insu, oui. Les créatures se terraient sans doute quelque part au milieu du chargement et personne n'a dû s'en apercevoir, à moins que... Nous savons que ces monstres sont capables de manipuler les esprits. Ils auraient très bien pu soumettre à leur volonté tous ceux qui ont eu le malheur de les débusquer. »

languages.text: "Tamamen habersiz bir şekilde. Yaratıklar, muhtemelen kargo kısmında sinsice gezip durdu Kimse onları fark etmedi ya da belki... Bu şeylerin zihinleri ele geçirebildiklerini biliyoruz. Yuvalarına denk gelenlerin zihinlerine hâkim olmuş olabilirler."
languages.original_text: "Purely out of ignorance. The creatures probably lurked in the cargo and no one discovered them, or perhaps... We know these things can take over minds. They could have dominated anyone who stumbled upon their nest."
